entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
